name: Running Through Russia 2
description: Second part of legendary Running Through Russia, funny runner with stereotypes about Russia and russian people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: Intel® Pentium® Processor N4200 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 505 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Tested, works very well
